author: Bloomberg News
title: Trudeau, banks in talks on relief package for small business
description: The Finance department has been in talks with Canadian lenders this week on a plan to provide emergency help for small businesses
content:
Canada’s finance department is working with the nation’s banks on a relief package for small business, according to people familiar with the talks.
